critique: The document is an executive order focused on supporting military veterans in obtaining merchant mariner credentials. It aims to address a shortage of qualified merchant mariners and bolster national security by leveraging the skills and experience of veterans. The order directs the Secretaries of Defense and Homeland Security to streamline credentialing processes, waive or pay fees for active duty service members, and ensure timely certification of sea service. It also emphasizes the importance of a robust merchant marine for national and economic security.
